word: Ella trabaja en una oficina en el centro.
translation: She works in an office downtown.
We're going to the movies tonight.

word: Aunque estaba cansado, decidió seguir trabajando hasta terminar el proyecto.
translation: Although he was tired, he decided to keep working until he finished the project.

word: Si hubiera sabido que venías, habría preparado algo especial para ti.
translation: If I had known you were coming, I would have prepared something special for you.

word: A pesar de las dificultades, lograron completar la expedición con éxito.
translation: Despite the difficulties, they managed to complete the expedition successfully.

word: No creo que él haya entendido lo que realmente quisiste decir.
translation: I don't think he understood what you really meant.

word: Cuando termine de leer el libro, te lo prestaré para que también lo disfrutes.
translation: When I finish reading the book, Ill lend it to you so you can enjoy it too.
